channel.title: [PI] Help please desperate
channel.description:
I need help, I am trying to make an NPC (Barbarian) that drops armadyl godsword, I have 2 questions
My first question, How do i Set the drops on it Because it drops Nothing. My second question, How do i make it hit higher and have a certain Hp?
Please help me :( been trying to figure this out forever and can not get it right, I got the spawn point where i want it but it still hits low and only has like 14 hp

item.title: [PI] Help please desperate
item.dc:creator: @kill_you704 kill you704
item.description:
@kill_you704 wrote:

dude wtf? i just told u and if thats how ur npcdrops.cfg is set up get a new source… cause if its set up like that u have the worst source known…
and liek i said on my first post it goes…
NpcID ItemID Amount [size=36pt]RATE![/size]

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Help please desperate
item.dc:creator: @Hextix Hextix
item.description:
@Hextix wrote:

Ok last thing, Can someone please help me with the Drop percentage? because like im in my File that shows the drops and stuff but its just a bunch of jumbled up Numbers and here is one line:
1160 10735 7592 7593 7594 7595 7596 995 892 564 11335 14876 15018 15019 15020 15220 13734 13736

I know 1160 is the ID but what are the other numbers? how does it go? How do i set the percentage of the item? Can anyone explain any of this to me?

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Help please desperate
item.dc:creator: @kill_you704 kill you704
item.description:
@kill_you704 wrote:

hex go to config file and go to npc.cfg
there npcID NpcName Combat Health Respawn
so do this

npc = 12	Barbarian			7	5000000	100

im guessing u want alot of hp cause it drops ags…
to add drops go to config file again go to npcdrops.cfg
copy this into the line above the first npc drop and use 1 enter space in between every npc drop

npcdrop = 12	'ags id'	1	10

the ‘ags id’ u can find in item.cfg do ctrl + f type in armadyl wait for your ags to come up take that id put in ags id the ‘1’ is the amount and the ‘10’ is rate good luck

Read full topic
